TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_+cengyi+,_lucek-kakalimaan, title = +cengyi+,_lucek-kakalimaan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/+cengyi+,_lucek-kakalimaan} }

S.FORM: +cengyi正義+, lucek-kakalimaan sapuelac 正義或公平正義(英語:justice；德語:Gerechtigkeit) . u +cengyi+ saan, u mahizaay pawanan ilabu' nu binawlan atu nizateng nu tademaw, tina zateng sa, u +Cesue+, hulic atu nasulitan, caay katezepay a kamu atu matatengil. sakamu sa ci Yalisetuode亞里斯多德: " u tademaw sa, u mapulungay katuuday a uzip". sakapatizeng tu mapulungay a putiput, kakaydihan patuling tu +cengyi+(lucek-kakalimaan). masimsim tu ciniza, u canan ku +cengyi+. saayaway, sacacayen ciniza ku +cengyi+ tu "habutud a +cengyi+普遍正義" atu "uzuma a +cengyi+特殊正義". u zuma a +cengyi+ sa, izaw ku "mawawada' a +cengyi+分配正義" atu " pasumaday a +cengyi+矯正正義". u habutud a +cengyi+ sa, amana paceba', amana matatiik tu tademaw, amana miubi atu mikidem. kanahatu, mazeteng tu kita ku "habutud a +cengyi+", uyzasa, u "uzama a +cengyi+" tadamaan tuway. u uzuma a +cengyi+ sa, u kakilulenay a kawaw ilabu' nu mapulungay katuuday. u mawawada' a +cengyi+ sa, ahizan ku icel atu nikayadah nu kawaw, pabelian tu aca, uyniyan sa, mahiza tu ku +cengyi+. yamalyilu tuud-suped, kinli, aca atu kasikac. pasumaday a +cengyi+" sa, pabucen tu siiluay a tademaw. piluceki tu labadesay a tademaw. saleku主張 sa ci Yalisetuode, mapulungay katuuday a putiput kakaydihan misaungay tu +cengyi+. ihekalay a tadeamw namatatengil tu +cengyi+, papina ku munday: u canan ku +cengyi+?u canan ku kakaydihan nu tademaw atu binawlan? ahican mawawada' ku tuud-suped atu laculaculan ilabu' nu binawlan? izaw ku yadahay a heci tu mahiniay. izaw ku mitesekay atu pasubana'ay, tinaku sumamaday a Sila a tademaw, pakuhica u kapahay a wayway nu tademaw, tahekal ilabu' nu tademaw saca binawlan atu putiput. taneng mala tademaw kuheni. u sasukapah, u zateng nu tademaw saca dietu, u kakalimaan重要的 a nizateng.

+cengyi正義+, locek-kakalimaan sapoelac 正義或公平正義(英語:jostice；德語:Gerechtigkeit) . o +cengyi+ saan, o mahizaay pawanan ilabo' no binawlan ato nizateng no tademaw, tina zateng sa, o +Cesoe+, holic ato nasolitan, caay katezepay a kamo ato matatengil. sakamo sa ci Yalisetoode亞里斯多德: " o tademaw sa, o mapolongay katooday a ozip". sakapatizeng to mapolongay a potipot, kakaydihan patoling to +cengyi+(locek-kakalimaan). masimsim to ciniza, o canan ko +cengyi+. saayaway, sacacayen ciniza ko +cengyi+ to "habotod a +cengyi+普遍正義" ato "ozoma a +cengyi+特殊正義". o zoma a +cengyi+ sa, izaw ko "mawawada' a +cengyi+分配正義" ato " pasomaday a +cengyi+矯正正義". o habotod a +cengyi+ sa, amana paceba', amana matatiik to tademaw, amana miobi ato mikidem. kanahato, mazeteng to kita ko "habotod a +cengyi+", oyzasa, o "ozama a +cengyi+" tadamaan toway. o ozoma a +cengyi+ sa, o kakilolenay a kawaw ilabo' no mapolongay katooday. o mawawada' a +cengyi+ sa, ahizan ko icel ato nikayadah no kawaw, pabelian to aca, oyniyan sa, mahiza to ko +cengyi+. yamalyilo tood-soped, kinli, aca ato kasikac. pasomaday a +cengyi+" sa, pabocen to siiloay a tademaw. piloceki to labadesay a tademaw. saleko主張 sa ci Yalisetoode, mapolongay katooday a potipot kakaydihan misaongay to +cengyi+. ihekalay a tadeamw namatatengil to +cengyi+, papina ko monday: o canan ko +cengyi+?o canan ko kakaydihan no tademaw ato binawlan? ahican mawawada' ko tood-soped ato lacolacolan ilabo' no binawlan? izaw ko yadahay a heci to mahiniay. izaw ko mitesekay ato pasobana'ay, tinako somamaday a Sila a tademaw, pakohica o kapahay a wayway no tademaw, tahekal ilabo' no tademaw saca binawlan ato potipot. taneng mala tademaw koheni. o sasokapah, o zateng no tademaw saca dieto, o kakalimaan重要的 a nizateng.
